doc:
John Benjamin Hickey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Benjamin_Hickey 0 John Benjamin Hickey (born June 25, 1963) is an American actor with a career in stage, film and television. He won the 2011 Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actor in a Play for his performance as Felix Turner in The Normal Heart. John_Benjamin_Hickey ( born June_25_,_1963 ) is an_American_actor with a_career in stage , film_and_television . He won the_2011_Tony_Award for Best Performance by a_Featured_Actor in a_Play for his_performance as Felix_Turner in The_Normal_Heart .
